name: Vevo
0:
”Alexa, play music videos”
”Alexa, play music videos by Beyoncé”
”Alexa, play music video for the song Hello”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Vevo on Amazon Alexa, you can use your voice to play music videos on your Echo Show (1st and 2nd generation). This is a free skill and does not require any set up. When you ask Alexa to play music videos, the skill is auto enabled.
You can request for music videos in the following ways:
 
By Artist:
Alexa, play music videos by Britney Spears
 
By Song title:
Alexa, play music video for Cheap Thrills
 
By Genre:
Alexa, play rock music videos
 
Popular music videos:
Alexa, play music videos
 
Controlling your music video experience:
You can say “Alexa, skip” to skip to the next music video
You can say “Alexa, stop” or “Alexa, pause” to pause your music video
You can say “Alexa, resume” to resume playing your music video
 
If you want to block the music video feature, you can navigate to the “Music” section under Settings. Scroll to the bottom to find options to enable the explicit filter. Turning on the filter will block music videos from playing until you disable the filter.

Vevo is the world’s leading music video and entertainment platform with over 350,000 music videos and 25 billion views per month.
Music and video skills may occasionally include strong profanity and sexual or suggestive themes
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
